languages.text: "Вожачка еретиков прорвалась в ковчег, где обитает Чудотворный Реактор Синтеза. Она пытается осквернить ритуал эксплуатации своими нечестивыми литаниями, дабы предать поруганию реликвию, а мир Райкад Минорис — гибели в огненной купели. Но мои братья, пребывающие в магнитной медитации, препятствуют богохульникам, заглушая вводимые ими команды хором молитв запроса предоставления доступа". {n}Претор Электроид кивает в сторону своих братьев, погруженных в транс.{/n}

"The leader of the heretics fought her way into the ark wherein dwells the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. She is trying to desecrate the Rite of Operation with her unholy litanies so that the relic may be corrupted and the world of Rykad Minoris may perish in a fount of fire. But my brethren, in their magnetic meditation, are hampering her efforts by chanting access request prayers in unison, thereby suppressing the commands that the blasphemers enter." {n}The Praetor Electroid nods toward his entranced comrades.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вожачка еретиков прорвалась в ковчег, где обитает Чудотворный Реактор Синтеза. Она пытается осквернить ритуал эксплуатации своими нечестивыми литаниями, дабы предать поруганию реликвию, а мир Райкад Минорис — гибели в огненной купели. Но мои братья, пребывающие в магнитной медитации, препятствуют богохульникам, заглушая вводимые ими команды хором молитв запроса предоставления доступа". {n}Претор Электроид кивает в сторону своих братьев, погруженных в транс.{/n}

He is trying to desecrate the Rite of Operation with his unholy litanies, so that the relic may be corrupted and the world of Rykad Minoris may perish in a font of fire. But my brethren, in their magnetic meditation, are hampering his efforts by chanting access request prayers in unison, thereby suppressing the commands that the blasphemers enter." {n}Praetor Electroid nods toward his entranced comrades.{/n}

languages.text: "Die Anführerin der Ketzer hat sich in den Schrein gekämpft, in dem der Wundersame Fusionsreaktor haust. Sie versucht, durch ihre unheiligen Litaneien das Betriebsritual zu stören. Dadurch soll das Relikt korrumpiert werden und die Welt von Rykad Minoris soll im Feuer untergehen. Doch meine Brüder behindern ihre Bemühungen durch ihre magnetische Meditation. Sie singen im Einklang Gebete, mit denen sie um Zugang bitten, und unterdrücken so die von den Blasphemisten eingegebenen Befehle." {n}Der Praetor Elektros nickt in Richtung seiner Kameraden, die sich allesamt in Trance befinden.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The leader of the heretics fought her way into the ark wherein dwells the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. She is trying to desecrate the Rite of Operation with her unholy litanies so that the relic may be corrupted and the world of Rykad Minoris may perish in a fount of fire. But my brethren, in their magnetic meditation, are hampering her efforts by chanting access request prayers in unison, thereby suppressing the commands that the blasphemers enter." {n}The Praetor Electroid nods toward his entranced comrades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Anführerin der Ketzer hat sich in den Schrein gekämpft, in dem der Wundersame Fusionsreaktor haust. Er versucht, durch seine unheiligen Litaneien das Betriebsritual zu stören. Dadurch soll das Relikt korrumpiert werden und die Welt von Rykad Minoris soll im Feuer untergehen. Doch meine Brüder behindern seine Bemühungen durch ihre magnetische Meditation. Sie singen im Einklang Gebete, mit denen sie um Zugang bitten, und unterdrücken so die von den Blasphemisten eingegebenen Befehle." {n}Der Praetor Elektros nickt in Richtung seiner Kameraden, die sich allesamt in Trance befinden.{/n}

languages.text: « Accompagnée de ses hommes, leur cheffe s'est frayé un chemin jusqu'à l'arche dans laquelle se trouve le réacteur à fusion miraculeux. Elle cherche à profaner le Rite d'Opération par ses litanies impies, dans le but de corrompre la relique et de faire périr le monde par les flammes... Fort heureusement, mes frères, dans leur méditation magnétique, l'en empêchent en psalmodiant à l'unisson des prières de demande d'accès, ce qui a pour effet de contrecarrer les commandes saisies par les blasphémateurs. » {n}Le praetor Électroïde hoche la tête en direction de ses compagnons en transe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The leader of the heretics fought her way into the ark wherein dwells the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. She is trying to desecrate the Rite of Operation with her unholy litanies so that the relic may be corrupted and the world of Rykad Minoris may perish in a fount of fire. But my brethren, in their magnetic meditation, are hampering her efforts by chanting access request prayers in unison, thereby suppressing the commands that the blasphemers enter." {n}The Praetor Electroid nods toward his entranced comrades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Accompagné de ses hommes, leur chef s'est frayé un chemin jusqu'à l'arche dans laquelle se trouve le réacteur à fusion miraculeux. Ils tentent de profaner le Rite d'Opération par leurs litanies impies, dans le but de corrompre la relique et de faire périr le monde par les flammes... Fort heureusement, mes frères, dans leur méditation magnétique, les en empêchent en psalmodiant à l'unisson des prières de demande d'accès, ce qui a pour effet de contrecarrer les commandes saisies par les blasphémateurs. » {n}Le praetor Électroïde hoche la tête en direction de ses compagnons en transe.{/n}

languages.text: “那些异端分子的首领一路杀入神赐聚变反应堆的庇护所。她试图用邪恶的祷词亵渎操作仪典，腐蚀圣物，让小莱卡德的世界在熊熊烈火中毁灭。我的兄弟们此刻正处于磁性冥想中，努力阻止她的阴谋。他们齐声吟唱准入请求祷词，抑制着亵渎者的入侵命令。”{n}驭电执行官朝那些处于神游状态的同伴点了点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The leader of the heretics fought her way into the ark wherein dwells the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. She is trying to desecrate the Rite of Operation with her unholy litanies so that the relic may be corrupted and the world of Rykad Minoris may perish in a fount of fire. But my brethren, in their magnetic meditation, are hampering her efforts by chanting access request prayers in unison, thereby suppressing the commands that the blasphemers enter." {n}The Praetor Electroid nods toward his entranced comrades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那些异端分子的首领一路杀入神赐聚变反应堆的庇护所。他试图用邪恶的祷词亵渎操作仪典，腐蚀圣物，让小莱卡德的世界在熊熊烈火中毁灭。我的兄弟们此刻正处于磁性冥想中，努力阻碍他的企图。他们齐声吟唱准入请求祷词，抑制着亵渎者的入侵命令。”{n}驭电执行官朝那些处于神游状态的同伴点了点头。{/n}

languages.text: 「異端者たちのリーダーが、奇跡のフュージョンリアクターのある箱舟に侵入した。奴は、不浄なる祈祷によって、任務の儀礼を冒涜しようとしている。それが成れば、遺物は腐敗し、ライカド・ミノリスの世界が火の海に滅ぶことになるだろう。しかし、同志たちは磁気瞑想の中で、一斉にアクセス要求の祈りを唱えることによって奴の目論見を防ぎ、それによって冒涜者の侵入を妨げているのだ」{n}電機人執行官は、祈りに没頭する仲間を見て頷く。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The leader of the heretics fought her way into the ark wherein dwells the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. She is trying to desecrate the Rite of Operation with her unholy litanies so that the relic may be corrupted and the world of Rykad Minoris may perish in a fount of fire. But my brethren, in their magnetic meditation, are hampering her efforts by chanting access request prayers in unison, thereby suppressing the commands that the blasphemers enter." {n}The Praetor Electroid nods toward his entranced comrades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「異端者たちのリーダーが、奇跡のフュージョンリアクターのある箱舟に侵入した。奴は、不浄なる祈祷によって、任務の儀礼を冒涜しようとしている。それが成れば、遺物は腐敗し、ライカド・ミノリスの世界が火の海に滅ぶことになるだろう。しかし、私の兄弟たちは、磁気瞑想の中で、一斉にアクセス要求の祈りを唱えることによって、奴の目論見を防ぎ、それによって冒涜者の侵入を妨げているのだ」{n}電機人執行官は、祈りに没頭する仲間を見て頷く。{/n}

languages.text: «La líder de los herejes se abrió paso hasta el arca donde está el Reactor de Fusión Milagrosa. Intenta profanar el Rito de la Operación con sus impías letanías, para que la reliquia se corrompa y el mundo de Rykad Minoris perezca en una fuente de fuego. Pero mis hermanos, en su magnética meditación, obstaculizan sus esfuerzos entonando al unísono oraciones de petición de acceso, suprimiendo así las órdenes de que entren los blasfemos». {n}El Praetor Electroide asiente hacia sus camaradas en trance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The leader of the heretics fought her way into the ark wherein dwells the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. She is trying to desecrate the Rite of Operation with her unholy litanies so that the relic may be corrupted and the world of Rykad Minoris may perish in a fount of fire. But my brethren, in their magnetic meditation, are hampering her efforts by chanting access request prayers in unison, thereby suppressing the commands that the blasphemers enter." {n}The Praetor Electroid nods toward his entranced comrades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El líder de los herejes se abrió paso hasta el arca donde está el Reactor de Fusión Milagrosa. Intenta profanar el Rito de la Operación con sus impías letanías, para que la reliquia se corrompa y el mundo de Rykad Minoris perezca en una fuente de fuego. Pero mis hermanos, en su magnética meditación, obstaculizan sus esfuerzos entonando al unísono oraciones de petición de acceso, suprimiendo así las órdenes de que entren los blasfemos». {n}El Praetor Electroide asiente hacia sus camaradas en trance.{/n}

languages.text: "Kâfirlerin elebaşı, Mucizevi Füzyon Reaktörü'nün bulunduğu arka girmeyi başardı. Şer yüklü ritüelleriyle Faaliyet Ayini'ni kirletmeye çalışıyor, böylece yadigâr yozlaşacak ve Rykad Minoris dünyası, ateşten bir memba içinde yok olacak. Manyetik meditasyonlarındaki kardeşlerimse bu çabasını engellemek için hep bir ağızdan erişim izni duaları okuyor, böylece dinsizlerin girdikleri komutları bastırıyorlar." {n}Praetor Elektroit, transa geçmiş yoldaşlarını başıyla işaret ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The leader of the heretics fought her way into the ark wherein dwells the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. She is trying to desecrate the Rite of Operation with her unholy litanies so that the relic may be corrupted and the world of Rykad Minoris may perish in a fount of fire. But my brethren, in their magnetic meditation, are hampering her efforts by chanting access request prayers in unison, thereby suppressing the commands that the blasphemers enter." {n}The Praetor Electroid nods toward his entranced comrades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirlerin lideri savaşarak arka ve içindeki Mucizevi Füzyon Reaktörü'ne girmeyi başardı. Kötücül ritüelleriyle Faaliyet Ayini'ni kirletmeye çalışıyor, böylece yadigâr yozlaşacak ve Rykad Minoris dünyası, ateşten bir membaya dönüşüp yok olacak. Manyetik meditasyonlarındaki kardeşlerimse bu çabasını engellemek için hep bir ağızdan erişim izni duaları okuyor, böylece dinsizlerin girdikleri komutları bastırıyorlar." {n}Praetor Elektroit, transa geçmiş yoldaşlarını başıyla işaret ediyor.{/n}
